X

How to Play:

  1. Fold - Fold your hand, granting your opponent the pot.
  2. Call or Check - Call - match the current bet for this action on this street. Check - decline the option to bet.
  3. Bet or Raise - Wager the amount in the bet input box (D).
  4. 3X or 1/2 Pot - Wager 3 times the big blind for the first bet/raise preflop. Wager 1/2 of the current pot.
  5. 4X or 2/3 Pot - Wager 4 times the big blind for the first bet/raise preflop. Wager 2/3 of the current pot.
  6. 5X or Pot - Wager 5 times the big blind for the first bet/raise preflop. Wager the current pot.
  7. All In - Wager all of your chips.

JavaScript Hold'em Poker
